attributes.action: re-examine the decision to sight the new Marine Management Organisation at Newcastle rather than Plymouth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The decision to sight the MMO at Newcastle is purely political due to the lobbying of NE Labour MPs and in particular the Gov Chief Whip.
Plymouth, by far, is a more suitable sight with National Marine Aquarium, Marine Laboratry and University Marine departments making it ideal for the new department.
It demonstrates the Government has no interest in the SW of England.
